# customMirror

**Instance Property**

A representation of the size’s structure and display style for use in debugging.

## Declaration

```swift
var customMirror: Mirror { get }
```

## Alternate Representations

- **debugDescription**: A textual representation of the size’s dimensions.

## From Protocol

- CustomReflectable

items.description: A textual representation of the size’s dimensions.
